ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent findings that indicate medical reasons for not conducting newborn hearing screening.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) attribute related to Negation Rationale. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who did not receive a newborn hearing screening due to a medical reason.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes to capture medical contraindication, surgical contraindication, or not indicated because there is a reason to withhold a certain medical procedure/treatment because it could harm a patient.),(Exclusion Criteria: Other reasons a screening was not performed, such as parent refusal, technical failure, or a missed procedure are excluded.)
